p: Doses of 2.5, 1.25, and 0.625 Âµg/mL of A. corrorima essential oil inhibited significantly the germination of radish, but not influenced the germination of the other species. Instead, A. subulatum and E. cardamomum essential oils not influenced the germination of the species considered ( Table 5). None of three oils, instead, seem to be effective against radicle elongation of all these species (data no shown).
